Name: Sitecore.Ship Publish Util
Description: Helps you publish .update files to a Sitecore instance from Powershell assuming you are using the Sitecore.Ship module

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
<#
    This function "smart" publishes the specified Sitecore target to the given $SiteUrl.
    Example usage: 
    .\publish-sitecorepackage.ps1 mysite.dev "preview,web" "en" "smart" 300
	.\publish-sitecorepackage.ps1 mysite.dev "preview,web" "en" "listofitems" 300 MyUserName MyPassword "C:/temp/ids.txt"


Param(
    [Parameter(Position=0, Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$SiteUrl,
    [Parameter(Position=1, Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$PublishTargets = "preview,web",
	[Parameter(Position=2, Mandatory=$true)]
    [string]$PublishLanguaes = "en",
	[Parameter(Position=3, Mandatory=$false)]
    [string]$PublishMode = "smart",
    [Parameter(Position=4)]
    [ValidateRange(0, 99999)]
    [int]$ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds = 300,
	[Parameter(Position=5)]
    [string]$Username,
	[Parameter(Position=6)]
    [string]$Password,
	[Parameter(Position=7)]
    [string]$ListOfIDsInputPath
)#>

$SiteUrl = if($OctopusParameters["SiteUrl"]){$OctopusParameters["SiteUrl"]} else { throw "SiteUrl required"}
$PublishTargets = if($OctopusParameters["PublishTargets"]){$OctopusParameters["PublishTargets"]} else { "web"}
$PublishLanguaes = if($OctopusParameters["PublishLanguaes"]){$OctopusParameters["PublishLanguaes"]} else { "en"}
$PublishMode = if($OctopusParameters["PublishMode"]){$OctopusParameters["PublishMode"]} else { "smart"}
$ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds = if($OctopusParameters["ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds"]){$OctopusParameters["ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds"]} else { 300 }
$Username = $OctopusParameters["Username"]
$Password = $OctopusParameters["Password"]

$previousDeployStep = $OctopusParameters["PreviousDeployStep"];
$ListOfIDsInputPath = ($OctopusParameters["Octopus.Action[" + $previousDeployStep + "].Output.Package.InstallationDirectoryPath"] + "_output.txt")


Write-Host "SiteUrl:" $SiteUrl
Write-Host "PreviousDeployStep:" $previousDeployStep
Write-Host "ListOfIDsInputPath:" $ListOfIDsInputPath
Write-Host "PublishTargets:" $PublishTargets
Write-Host "PublishLanguaes:" $PublishLanguaes
Write-Host "PublishMode:" $PublishMode
Write-Host "ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds:" $ConnectionTimeOutInSeconds
Write-Host "Username:" $Username
Write-Host "Password:" $Password

$publishUrl = "$SiteUrl/services/publish/$PublishMode"

$targetDatabases = $PublishTargets -split ","
$targetLanguages = $PublishLanguaes -split ","
$pubishItems = @{
		targets = $targetDatabases
		languages = $targetLanguages
	}

if($PublishMode -eq "listofitems")
{
	if (-not (Test-Path $ListOfIDsInputPath)) 
	{
		throw [System.IO.FileNotFoundException] "listofitems publish: $ListOfIDsInputPath not found."
	}
    [Collections.Generic.List[String]]$items = [IO.File]::ReadAllLines($ListOfIDsInputPath) 
	Write-Host $items -foregroundcolor cyan
	$pubishItems = @{
			TargetDatabases = $targetDatabases
			TargetLanguages = $targetLanguages
			Items = $items
		}
}
	
if($Username){
	$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString $Password -AsPlainText -Force
	$mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ($Username, $secpasswd)
	Write-Host "POST Publish $PublishMode with credentials to $publishUrl" -foregroundcolor green
	Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $publishUrl -Method POST -ContentType "application/json" -Body ($pubishItems | ConvertTo-Json) -cred $mycreds
}
else{
	Write-Host "POST Publish $PublishMode to $publishUrl" -foregroundcolor green
	Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $publishUrl -Method POST -ContentType "application/json" -Body ($pubishItems | ConvertTo-Json)
}

Parameters.Name: SiteUrl
Parameters.Label: Site Url
Parameters.HelpText: Url for the site you are installing the .update package on (ex: _http://mysite.dev_)

Parameters.Name: PublishTargets
Parameters.Label: Publish Targets
Parameters.HelpText: The db targets for the publish, comma delimited (ex: _preview, web_)

Parameters.Name: PublishLanguages
Parameters.Label: Publish Languages
Parameters.HelpText: The language targets for the publish, comma delimited (ex: _en_)

Parameters.Name: PublishMode
Parameters.Label: Publish Mode
Parameters.HelpText: The publish mode (ex: smart, full, incremental or listofitems)

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: If your Ship endpoint requires authentication, insert Username here.

Parameters.Name: Password
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: If your Ship endpoint requires authentication, insert Password here.

Parameters.Name: PreviousDeployStep
Parameters.Label: Previous Deploy Step
Parameters.HelpText: Use this only if you are publishing the site using the _ListOfItems_ publish mode, associating the previous deploy step will grab the created list
